Bottom of 12th from 5/24 SLST.

$Play was suspended for 20 minutes because of rain
$Heffner suffered a slight hand injury earlier in the game

Ninth inning from 6/23 SLPD.
$Game start was delayed 45 minutes due to rain
$Game called for curfew
Yankees and Browns tie the current ML record for most pitchers used in a game with eleven.
WP by Niggeling in 1st and PB by Susce may be in reverse order.
$Radcliff left with upset stomach
$lf eating lemon missed ball, which bounced over fence then continued eating lemon
$Game called for rain
$McQuinn's hit was off the wall, but Laabs thought it would be caught and was late advancing to 3rd; Grace went to 2nd and McQuinn was out trying to return to 1st
$Ben Chapman hurt leg running bases in 5th
$onto pavillion roof
$onto pavillion roof
$Beau Bell called for interference with Johnny Beradino's throw
$F. Chapman hurt his throwing arm
DiMaggo suffers recurrence of a charley horse on his single and exits the game.
First ML appearance for Fuzz White
$Beradino spiked Cronin who left game
